attributes.action: Charge all un-vaccinated people for any Covid related medical care.
attributes.additional_details: To help encourage more people to get vaccinated and to think about the financial implications non vaccinated individuals place on the health service.
attributes.background: Introduce new laws to charge health care costs relating to the care of anyone who has refused a vaccination. Use private medical care benchmarks as the costing standard.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603747
